actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to establish a grant program for construction of publicly owned treatment works in economically distressed rural communities.
short_title: Rural Community Clean Water Assistance Act of 1993
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Rural Community Clean Water Assistance Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to States, municipalities, and other appropriate agencies for the construction of publicly owned water treatment works located in economically distressed rural communities and for certain other water pollution control purposes. States the Federal share of such grants to be 90 percent of the construction costs. Provides for the allotment of available funds to States for such construction. Requires such funds to be obligated within the fiscal year authorized and the succeeding fiscal year, after which time a reallotment shall occur. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Rural Community Clean Water Assistance Act of 1993
To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to establish a grant program for construction of publicly owned treatment works in economically distressed rural communities.
